DATASET.alias: TODO: Submitter designated name for the Dataset. The name must be unique within the submission account
DATASET.center_name: TODO: The center name (acronym) of the submitter's account
DATASET.broker_name: TODO: The center name (its acronym) of the broker if applicable, if not, remove this attribute (broker_name)
DATASET.TITLE: TODO: Short text that can be used to call out data sets in searches or in displays
DATASET.DESCRIPTION: TODO: Free-form text describing the data sets
DATASET.DATASET_TYPE: TODO: Type of the dataset. Must be value from Controlled vocabulary: 'Whole genome sequencing','Exome sequencing','Genotyping by array','Transcriptome profiling by high-throughput sequencing','Transcriptome profiling by array','Amplicon sequencing','Methylation binding domain sequencing','Methylation profiling by high-throughput sequencing','Phenotype information','Study summary information','Genomic variant calling','Chromatin accessibility profiling by high-throughput sequencing','Histone modification profiling by high-throughput sequencing', 'Chip-Seq'. If the dataset is not within these listed types, remove the 'DATASET_TYPE' TAG

RUN_REF.accession: TODO: Accession number of the RUN that this dataset encompasses (RUN accessions start with EGAR...)

ANALYSIS_REF.accession: TODO: Accession number of the ANALYSIS that this dataset encompasses (ANALYSIS accessions start with EGAZ...)

POLICY_REF.accession: TODO: Accession number of the POLICY that this dataset encompasses (POLICY accessions start with EGAP...)

URL_LINK.LABEL: TODO: Optional text label to display for the link
URL_LINK.URL: TODO: Optional the internet service link (file:..., http:..., ftp:... etc.). In other words, the website address (e.g. http://www.mywebsite.org/dataset.html).

DATASET_ATTRIBUTE.TAG: TODO: Optional name of the custom attribute.
DATASET_ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: TODO: Optional value of the custom attribute.
